{{cpp/utility/expected/title|error_or}}
{{cpp/utility/expected/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|num=1|1=
template&lt; class G = E &gt; 
constexpr E error_or( G&amp;&amp; default_value ) const&amp;;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|num=2|1=
template&lt; class G = E &gt; 
constexpr E error_or( G&amp;&amp; default_value ) &amp;&amp;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the unexpected value if it exists, otherwise returns {{c|default_value}}.

@1@ If {{c|std::is_copy_constructible_v&lt;E&gt;}} or {{c|std::is_convertible_v&lt;G, E&gt;}} is {{c|false}}, the program is ill-formed.

@2@ If {{c|std::is_move_constructible_v&lt;E&gt;}} or {{c|std::is_convertible_v&lt;G, E&gt;}} is {{c|false}}, the program is ill-formed.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|default_value|the value to use in case {{c|*this}} does not contain an unexpected value}}
{{par hreq}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|has_value() ? std::forward&lt;G&gt;(default_value) : error()}}

@2@ {{c|has_value() ? std::forward&lt;G&gt;(default_value) : std::move(error())}}
